citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
On Friday, March 23, 2014 at approximately 1045 this facility did not have a person available so an animal welfare
inspection could be conducted.
A responsible adult must be made available to accompany the inspector on an animal welfare inspection.
Correct for all future unannounced inspections

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
On Friday, March 23, 2014 at approximately 1045 this facility did not have a person available so an animal welfare
inspection could be conducted.
A responsible adult must be made available to accompany the inspector on an animal welfare inspection.
Correct for all future unannounced inspections
